context: The Finnish word 'järjestää' is a verb that means to arrange, organize, or set up something. It can be used in various contexts such as arranging meetings (kokous), organizing parties (juhla), or setting up events (tapahtuma). The verb changes form depending on the subject - for example 'minun täytyy järjestää' (I have to arrange), 'hän järjestää' (he/she arranges), and 'me järjestämme' (we arrange).
